DOC.brief_summary: Prophylactic enteral probiotics may enhance clinical markers and biomarkers of preterm infants' health, and may also play a role in reducing NEC and associated morbidity.
DOC.brief_title: Study the Safety and Efficacy of Probiotics Use in Premature Infants
